hibernate-mapping.query: select si1.token.processInstance from org.jbpm.context.exe.variableinstance.StringInstance si1, org.jbpm.context.exe.variableinstance.StringInstance si2 where si1.token = si2.token and si1.value = :docId and si2.value = :repoId and si1.name = 'documentId' and si2.name = 'documentRepositoryName' and si1.token.processInstance.end is null
select si.token.processInstance from org.jbpm.context.exe.variableinstance.StringInstance si where si.value in (:initiators) and si.name = 'initiator' order by si.token.processInstance.start desc

select t from org.jbpm.context.exe.variableinstance.StringInstance si1, org.jbpm.context.exe.variableinstance.StringInstance si2, org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance t where (si1.id member of t.variableInstances or si1.token.id = t.token.id) and si1.name = 'documentId' and si2.name = 'documentRepositoryName' and si1.value = :docId and si2.value = :repoId and t.end is null
